alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL CROOK COUNTY THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 501 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Cook Lake, or 12 miles north of Sundance, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beulah around 515 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 197 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
